recipe.title: Chicory salad with apples
recipe.details: One of the secrets is you need to use a lot of dressing for this salad. Spread dressing in time steps. Cheese should be piquant.

steps.details: Get the juice from one the lemon.
Prepare dressing: mix mustart with lemon juice, olive oil, agave syrup and salt. Mix.
Cut chicory salad by long side in 4 pieces. Put it on a plate and add dressing.
Get the juice from remaining 0.5 lemon.
Cut the apple to a small pieces. Pour with lemon juice and place apples on top on chicory salad.
Cut the blue cheese to a small pieces and add to them to salad.
